project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project consists of the following: (a) construction of the final extension of the Prai Thermal Power Station comprising three units of 120 MW each, scheduled for service in August 1979, February 1980 and August 1980, respectively; (b) installation of a 132 kV transmission line from Majadee switching station to Kota Tinggi, scheduled for service in 1978; (c) extension of 11 kV distribution system to two rural areas, scheduled for service in 1978; and (d) consulting services for a rural electrification study and other services.
